name: Marcus J., Owner of MJ Courier Services
quote: Before Credit Master AI, I didn’t even know business credit existed. Now, I’ve got $75,000 in revolving credit and my company finally looks legit on paper.

name: Anita P.
quote: I tried building business credit myself for over a year with no results. These guys got me approved for my first Net 30 accounts in 2 weeks!

name: Jamal R.
quote: The roadmap was so easy to follow. I went from 0 to an 85 Paydex score and $50k in vendor credit with their help.

name: Tasha B.
quote: What I loved most was the personal support. They actually cared about helping me get funded—not just selling software.

name: David L.
quote: Credit Master AI taught me the game banks don’t want you to know. I didn’t need to use my personal credit to get approved.

name: Erica M.
quote: They helped me fix my setup and get listed with Experian and D&B. Now lenders actually take me seriously.

name: Henry S.
quote: I was denied 3 times before. Now I’ve got a business credit card with a $15k limit and a fleet card for my trucks.

name: Priya K.
quote: Their dashboard makes it easy to track everything—credit scores, vendors, tiers. I finally feel in control of my finances.
